#Merge Valencia and UK
```{r load data}
library(phyloseq)
ps_raw_metaphlan <- readRDS("/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/metaphlan/ps_raw_metaphlan.Rds")
ps_raw_Patel_met <- readRDS("/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/metaphlan/ps_raw_Patel_met.Rds")

ps_merged_raw_met <- merge_phyloseq(ps_raw_metaphlan, ps_raw_Patel_met)

saveRDS(ps_merged_raw_met, "/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/merged/ps_merged_raw_met.Rds")


ps_filtered_Spain <- readRDS("/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/metaphlan/ps_filtered.Rds") 
ps_UKfiltered <- readRDS("/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/metaphlan/ps_UKfiltered.Rds") 

ps_merged_filtered_met <- merge_phyloseq(ps_filtered_Spain, ps_UKfiltered)

saveRDS(ps_merged_filtered_met, "/fast/AG_Forslund/Lola/Secuencias_INCLIVA_2024/MHE_rif/outputs/merged/ps_merged_filtered_met.Rds")

```
